TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IJSVsaItems implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because it is being deprecated in Visual Studio 2005; there will be no replacement for this feature. Please see the ICodeCompiler documentation for additional help.")

Docs.summary: Defines an interface for a collection of objects, which can be addressed either by name or by index.
Gets the number of items in the specified collection.
Docs.value: Returns the integer value for the number of items in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaItem CreateItem (string name, Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaItemType itemType, Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaItemFlag itemFlag);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaItem CreateItem(string name, valuetype Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaItemType itemType, valuetype Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaItemFlag itemFlag) cil managed

Docs.param:
The name to associate with the new item.
In cases where the item is a reference item type, the name parameter must be exactly the same as the name of the referenced assembly, as set with the <xref:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaReferenceItem.AssemblyName%2A> property. In JScript, however, if you do not specify an AssemblyName, JScript will use the ItemName as the name of the assembly.
The type of item created, as defined in the enumeration.
The optional flag to specify the initial content of a Code item.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of one of the types, as defined in the enumeration.
Docs.returns: Returns a reference to the object created.

Docs.param: A 0-based index of the retrievable items.
Docs.summary: Gets an item from the collection by its index value.
Docs.value: Returns the item at the specified index.

Docs.param: The name of the item to retrieve from the collection.
Docs.summary: Gets an item from the collection by its name.
Docs.value: Returns the item specified by name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Remove(int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The index value of the item to be removed.
Docs.summary: Removes an item from the collection, as specified by its index value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Remove(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the item to be removed from the collection.
Docs.summary: Removes an item from the collection, as specified by its name.
